translations: 搜索网；拖网；法网；收集装置（等于 drawnet）

sentences.sentence: Cue ominous theme music from Dragnet.
sentences.translation: 仿佛电影里不详的主题音乐随之响起。

sentences.sentence: No charges have been filed, but the dragnet alarmed investors.
sentences.translation: 虽然目前还没有正式的指控，但这样的事件令投资者饱受惊吓。

sentences.sentence: Can increase the weight that many dragnet stand at the same time so!
sentences.translation: 这样能同时提高多个搜索网站的权重！
